conbody.p: This user guide employs the following terminology:

strow.stentry: Place the mouse pointer over the indicated object or field name. Do not click the mouse button.
Hover the mouse pointer over the indicated object and click the primary mouse button once.
Hover the mouse pointer over the indicated object and click the primary mouse button twice rapidly.
Hover the mouse pointer over the indicated object and click the secondary mouse button once.
Click an object, hold the primary mouse button down, and then drag the object to the desired location.
In a hierarchical tree, click the + (plus) that appears next to a branch item in the hierarchy to expand that branch.
In a hierarchical tree, click the - (minus) that appears next to a branch item in the hierarchy to collapse that branch.
